    • 方法详细资料

      • isServiceRunning

        public static boolean isServiceRunning(android.content.Context context,
                                       java.lang.Class<? extends android.app.Service> service)
        判断当前服务是否在运行 Checks if the specified service is currently running or not.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        service - the Class of the service.
        返回:
        true if the service is running, false otherwise.

      • isServiceRunning

        public static boolean isServiceRunning(android.content.Context context,
                                       java.lang.Class<? extends android.app.Service> service,
                                       int maxCheckCount)
        判断当前服务是否在运行 Checks if the specified service is currently running or not.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        service - the Class of the service.
        maxCheckCount - maximum value of the running service count for this check.
        返回:
        true if the service is running, false otherwise.

      • getPackageNameFromPid

        public static java.lang.String getPackageNameFromPid(android.content.Context context,
                                                     int pid)
        通过pid获取包名 Get package name of the process id.
        参数:
        context - the context.
        pid - the process id.
        返回:
        the package name for the process id. null if no process found.
